Bob: "Diana, you're jumping to conclusions. I'm not the mafioso—I'm just a villager trying to survive. Why reveal yourself so quickly if you're really the detective? Sounds suspicious to me."
Bob: "Diana, if you're really the detective, why didn't you investigate someone else first? This feels like a setup to frame me. We should vote you out instead."

You: "Diana has provided a clear and specific claim with an investigation result pointing to Bob as the mafioso. Bob’s quick deflection seems suspicious. I trust Diana and will vote to arrest Bob."

Bob was arrested
